DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine certain treatment low back pain change way nerve leg send message . Specifically , investigator examine whether particular type physical therapy treatment individual low back pain ( neurodynamic technique ) change speed nerve send/receive signal to/from leg , compare different physical therapy treatment .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Of A Neurodynamic Treatment On Nerve Conduction In Clients With Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Males female age 18 year old Participants speak English read , understand , fill consent form questionnaires Participants certain level low back pain grade numerically , without radiation leg Clinical decision ( individual ) safe participate study base subjective history objective examination . An inability tolerate sit 10 minute Nerve conduction disorder diagnose physician , diabetes MS Current participant investigational drug study ( within past 3 month )
